attributes.action: Stop the sale of electric shock collars for dogs
attributes.additional_details: The use of electroconvulsive therapy on animals is a barbaric practise, with no scientific evidence proving that it is beneficial to animals. Having seen thousands sold online within UK, this is a worrying modern form of animal abuse. Despite previous efforts of the government to ban this product, these are still being sold in the masses.
attributes.background: We want the government to firstly, ban this product from being imported, exported, manufactured, sold or traded within the UK. A future law to be implemented, by which users of said product will receive sentencing for animal abuse, and the possession of a prohibited weapon.
